_comment: MCP Server Configuration Template - Copy to .mcp.json in your project root

google-tag-manager-mcp-server._comment: GTM API operations - templates, tags, variables, triggers, versions

stape-mcp-server._comment: Stape sGTM container management - optional, requires API key

setup: 1. Copy this file to your project root as .mcp.json
3. For Stape: Set STAPE_API_KEY environment variable
4. Restart Claude Desktop/Code to load servers
5. First GTM command will trigger Google OAuth in browser

authentication.gtm: OAuth via browser - tokens cached in ~/.mcp-auth

troubleshooting: If auth fails: rm -rf ~/.mcp-auth && restart Claude
If no access: Verify Google account has GTM permissions
If Stape fails: Check API key is valid
